summary: Build a news portal website named “Sanukhabar” where users can find all types of news across multiple categories.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Sanukhabar wordmark logo, clean editorial style, transparent background (sanukhabar-logo.dim_512x160.png)
- Wide homepage hero banner with subtle newspaper texture and abstract world/news motifs, no text (sanukhabar-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
- Set of 6 simple editorial category icons (Politics, Sports, Business, Technology, Entertainment, World) in a consistent outline style, transparent backgrounds (sanukhabar-category-icons.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public-facing Sanukhabar news portal frontend with a responsive layout that lets users browse all types of news.
Implement news categories and category-based navigation so users can easily find different types of news.
Implement article detail pages that display the full content of a selected news article.
Add an authenticated admin interface for publishing news articles and managing categories using Internet Identity.
Add basic search and sorting on the frontend to help users find relevant news quickly.

Apply a cohesive, newspaper-inspired visual theme across the site (avoid blue/purple): off-white backgrounds, charcoal text, muted red accent, clear typography hierarchy (serif for headlines, sans-serif for UI), and consistent spacing.
Generate and include static brand assets for Sanukhabar and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images via the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create the Sanukhabar news portal website (public-facing site) to publish and browse news articles.
Support multiple news categories so users can find all types of news organized by category.
Add backend storage and APIs for news articles, including creating, updating, deleting, listing (latest), listing by category, and fetching by ID.
